name: WebThriftStore
overview:
WebThriftStore allows any non-profit to run an online thrift store without holding inventory, and with no financial risk.

WebThriftStore turns unneeded stuff into cash for charities, tax deductions for donors, and bargains for buyers. It’s a way for buyers and sellers to do good, and for charities to engage supporters without asking for money.

The average US household has $7,000 worth of stuff they don’t want. WebThriftStore provides a simple way to get rid of all that stuff while supporting your favorite charity. Donors sell their unneeded items from the comfort of home, buyers find great bargains and nonprofits get badly needed cash.

And, we’re great for the environment too! WebThriftStore brings one of the cornerstones of reuse – the thrift store – online, and provides a way to recapture the value of goods we no longer use. In this way, we avoid unnecessary production and reduce the need for landfills.
